title: Average price for properties for sale in Rome , Italy 2019 , by area
yAxis: Price in euros per square meter
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Area, and Price in euros per square meter in each Area on the y axis.
Area Centro Storico has the highest Price in euros per square meter and Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi has the lowest Price in euros per square meter.
The difference of Price in euros per square meter between the highest and lowest Area is 3845.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Area, and Price in euros per square meter in each Area on the y axis.
The Price in euros per square meter is highest at Area Centro Storico and lowest at Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.

Area Centro Storico has the highest Price in euros per square meter and Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi has the lowest Price in euros per square meter.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Area in the x axis and Price in euros per square meter in the y axis.
The Price in euros per square meter is highest at Area Centro Storico and lowest at Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.
Area Aventino San Saba Caracalla has the second highest value for Price in euros per square meter.
The Price in euros per square meter of Area Centro Storico is 1.97% larger than the minimum value at Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.

The Area Centro Storico has the highest Price in euros per square meter, followed by Aventino San Saba Caracalla, and Parioli Flaminio. Down to the Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi which is the lowest.
